title: Tag [Complete] + Cursed

Tag description:

Spine-snapping horror in the tradition of the movie The Ring! When an average joe strolls down the street after a fight with his girlfriend, a random stranger TAGS him, handing off an ancient pagan curse! Now he's literally dead Ã¢â‚¬â€œ and rotting Ã¢â‚¬â€œ as he sees his body begin to decompose every day before his very eyes. Cursed, he must either surrender, or find the next victim to TAGÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ A new mini-series from white-hot Wizard Magazine favorite Keith Giffen and 30 Days of Night Bloodsucker Tales artist Kody Chamberlain!

Tag - Cursed description: (SPOILER ALERT)

The horror epic continues! When Ed was tagged, he found himself cursed to become a literal member of the walking dead -- physically decaying, but still able to think and speak. Terrified, he found the next victim he had to tag to pass along the curse. It's years later, and Ed can't live with the guilt of passing along the curse. So he decides -- to stop it? How can one ordinary man hope to halt the advance of a curse that crosses centuries? A descent into hard-edged darkness and despair!
